content: सन् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> ; {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> (सनति, सनोति, सनुते, सात; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} सन्यते, सायते; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} सिसनिषति, सिषासति) {@--1@} To love, like. {@--2@} To worship, honour. {@--3@} To acquire, obtain. {@--4@} To receive graciously. {@--5@} To honor with gifts, give, bestow, distribute.
